message.content:
Step 1: Identify the values from the cash flow statement for the relevant date.
• Net Profit = 1,103,190.60  
• Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities = 1,598,438.00

Step 2: Calculate the ratio using the formula:  
  Operating Cash Flow to Net Income Ratio = (Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities) / (Net Profit)

Step 3: Perform the calculation:  
  Ratio = 1,598,438.00 / 1,103,190.60 ≈ 1.448 (rounded to 1.45)

Step 4: Present your answer in the specified JSON format.

{
  "solution": {"Operating Cash Flow to Net Income Ratio": "1.45"}
}
